REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0667 reute u f BC-CONTINENTAL 03-02 0048
REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - CONTINENTAL ILL <CIL> In WASHINGTON story, "CONTINENTAL ILL. <CIL> TO RECHARACTERIZE LOSS," please read in second paragraph ... to report the 425 mln dlrs together with other required loan loss provisions instead of singling it out as a separate item. .... Reverses previous. Reuter
